description: This will open a response text write-only stream that will be written to the http response.

parameters.description: This is the streamId that will be associated with this open response stream.
parameters.name: streamId

parameters.description: If specified and true, this will automatically flush the stream's buffers after every write.
parameters.name: autoFlush

returns.description: The streamNumber for the streamId or -1 if there was an error. Use get_stream_error() for error information.
